original_text: After the death of Joshua, the people of Israel inquired of the Lord, “Who shall go up first for us against the Canaanites, to fight against them?”
korean_text: 여호수아가 죽은 후에 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 여쭈어 이르되 우리 가운데 누가 먼저 올라가서 가나안 족속과 싸우리이까

sentences.original_text: the people of Israel inquired of the Lord,
Who shall go up first for us
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 우리를 위해 먼저 올라가야 합니까
